concept.title: Changes to Adobe Analytics
concept.shortdesc: Announcing upcoming changes to Adobe Analytics.

conbody.p: In May 2014, Adobe made the following changes:

ul.li: Data warehouse will no longer be accessible through the Version 14 UI. After this change, you will need to log in to Adobe Analytics to schedule data warehouse reports. All existing data warehouse jobs will continue to be processed and delivered as usual.

The New, Edit, and Delete buttons will be removed from the ASI Slots UI in Version 14. After this change, you will need to log in to Adobe Analytics to define ASI Slot segments. All existing ASI slots will continue to be processed as usual.
